title: Remove call feature and rename app to MessageCenter

requirements.text: Remove the entire call feature from the backend Motoko canister, including all call-related types, state, and public methods, so the canister interface no longer exposes any call APIs.

quotes: remove the call feature since we cant have real calls.
Just confirm: do you want **everything related to calls fully removed** from both backend and frontend?

acceptanceCriteria: backend/main.mo no longer defines CallStatus or Call types.
backend/main.mo no longer keeps call-related state (e.g., calls map, nextCallId).
backend/main.mo no longer exposes initiateCall, updateCallStatus, or getCallHistory.
The generated Candid/TypeScript declarations no longer include call types or call methods, and the project compiles.

requirements.text: Remove the entire call feature from the frontend UI and data layer, including the Calls page, the /calls route, call-related React Query hooks, and any navigation entries or icons that link to calls.

quotes: remove the call feature since we cant have real calls.
Just confirm: do you want **everything related to calls fully removed** from both backend and frontend?

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/pages/CallsPage.tsx is removed or no longer referenced anywhere in the app build.
frontend/src/App.tsx no longer imports CallsPage and no longer defines a /calls route.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppShell.tsx bottom navigation no longer shows a “Calls” tab and does not navigate to /calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts no longer exports useGetCallHistory, useInitiateCall, or useUpdateCallStatus, and there are no remaining call-related imports (Call, CallStatus).
The frontend builds and runs without referencing call features.

requirements.text: Rename the app to “MessageCenter” in user-facing branding locations (e.g., header title and browser tab title) so the UI consistently shows the new app name.

quotes: and rename the app to MessageCenter

acceptanceCriteria: The top-bar app name displayed in the UI is “MessageCenter” (replacing the current “Connect”).
No remaining user-facing strings refer to the old app name(s) (e.g., “Connect”, “TalkingPalace”) in primary branding locations.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional backend services.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths; compose existing UI components instead.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Implementing real-time voice/video calling, WebRTC calling, or any other live call functionality.
Adding new communication features beyond removing calls and renaming the app.

fieldsToSet.summary: Build MessageCenter, a social communication app with messaging, video creation/sharing, video ratings, customizable profiles, theming (including dark/light mode), and a friends/best-friends list.
